results.description: Southend's Harry Lennon is made to train with their under-23s after being filmed out with Dover players after Sunday's FA Cup defeat.
results.shortTitle: Lennon demoted to under-23s after video
results.title: Harry Lennon: Southend defender training with under-23s after social media video

results.description: Five Luton Town fans are jailed for "orchestrated" violence with Southend United supporters.
results.title: Luton football hooligans jailed for brawl with Southend fans

results.description: Southend boss Sol Campbell accuses his side of 'playing with a handbrake on' in their FA Cup loss to non-league Dover.
results.shortTitle: Southend 'scared to score' in Dover loss
results.title: Dover Athletic 1-0 Southend United: Sol Campbell's Shrimpers beaten by non-league side

thumbnail.altText: Dover Athletic's Ruel Sotiriou celebrates scoring against Southend United

results.description: Watch highlights as a late goal from Ruel Sotiriou sees non-league Dover Athletic beat Sol Campbell's Southend United to reach the second round of the FA Cup.
results.title: FA Cup: Dover Athletic 1-0 Southend United highlights

results.description: Listen to local radio commentaries from nine FA Cup first-round ties.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Hayes & Yeading v Oxford United
results.title: Listen: FA Cup first round commentaries including Bristol Rovers & Leyton Orient

results.description: League One strugglers Southend United are issued with a fourth winding-up petition this year by HM Revenue & Customs.
results.title: Southend United: League One club face fourth winding-up petition of 2019

results.description: Sol Campbell's wait for his first point as Southend manager goes on after the League One strugglers slump to defeat at Portsmouth.
results.title: Portsmouth 4-1 Southend United

results.description: Luke O'Nien's first-half header earns Sunderland a League One win over a spirited Southend United.
results.title: Sunderland 1-0 Southend United

results.description: Sol Campbell begins his reign as Southend manager with a home defeat by promotion hopefuls Ipswich at Roots Hall.
results.title: Southend United 1-3 Ipswich Town: Sol Campbell loses first game in charge

results.description: Former England defender Sol Campbell urges Southend's players to "dig deep" to avoid the drop after arriving as manager.
results.shortTitle: The players have to dig deep - Campbell
results.title: Sol Campbell: Southend United manager calls on players to 'dig deep'

results.description: Ex-Celtic striker Tommy Johnson becomes Blackpool's head of recruitment, after talks over a job at Southend were ended.
results.title: Tommy Johnson: Blackpool appoint ex-Southend target as head of recruitment

results.description: Ex-England defender Sol Campbell is named Southend manager and then watches his new side lose 7-1 from the stands.
results.title: Sol Campbell: Southend United name ex-England defender as new manager

results.description: Doncaster boss Darren Moore backs Sol Campbell to succeed at Southend after the newly appointed Shrimpers boss watched his side lose 7-1 at home.
results.title: Southend United 1-7 Doncaster Rovers

results.description: Paul Mullin's 85th-minute penalty salvages a point for Tranmere Rovers against struggling Southend United.
results.title: Tranmere Rovers 1-1 Southend United

results.description: Former Celtic and Sweden striker Henrik Larsson will not be the new manager of Southend United after talks broke down.
results.shortTitle: Larsson deal to manage Southend collapses
results.title: Henrik Larsson: Southend United talks over manager role collapse

results.description: In-form Marcus Forss grabs a hat-trick to fire AFC Wimbledon to a thumping win at fellow strugglers Southend.
results.title: Southend United 1-4 AFC Wimbledon

results.description: Managerless Southend have Emile Acquah sent off as they lose at Gillingham, their ninth defeat in 11 league games.
results.title: Gillingham 3-1 Southend United

results.description: Ex-Macclesfield Town boss Sol Campbell has been interviewed for Southend United's manager role, reports BBC Essex.
results.title: Sol Campbell: Southend United interview ex-England defender for manager vacancy

results.description: Southend United confirm they are in talks with ex-Celtic and Sweden striker Henrik Larsson about their managerial vacancy.
results.shortTitle: Larsson in talks over Southend job
results.title: Henrik Larsson: Southend United in talks with ex-Celtic star over manager's job

results.description: Henrik Larsson again watches from the stands as managerless 10-man Southend slump to a defeat to Accrington at Roots Hall.
results.title: Southend United 0-1 Accrington Stanley
